H0.text: A portable radio is designed to transform an electromagnetic wave into a mechanical wave.

H1.text: A television screen is designed to transform an electromagnetic wave into a mechanical wave.

H2.text: A computer monitor is the device designed to transform an electromagnetic wave into a mechanical wave.

H3.text: A mercury thermometer is designed to transform an electromagnetic wave into a mechanical wave.

A4.text: The sound is reproduced either by a loudspeaker in the radio or an earphone which plugs into a jack on the radio.
